column.name: idAccountingResourceType
column.remarks: 1 - VirtualMachine-vcpu; 2 - VirtualMachine-vram; 3 - VirtualMachine-vhd; 4 - ExternalStorage; 5 - IPAddress;

column.name: serversTotal
column.remarks: Total number of Physical machines managed.

column.name: serversRunning
column.remarks: Total number of Physical Machines running currently.

column.name: storageTotal
column.remarks: External storage managed by Abiquo (in Megabytes)

column.name: storageReserved
column.remarks: External storage reserved by Enterprises in Datacenters (in Megabytes)

column.name: storageUsed
column.remarks: External storage used (attached or mounted) by any virtual machines (in Megabytes)

column.name: publicIPsTotal
column.remarks: Total number of IPs defined (managed).

column.name: publicIPsReserved
column.remarks: Total number of IPs assigned to a VirtualDatacenter (Reserved)

column.name: publicIPsUsed
column.remarks: Total number of IPs used by virtual machines

column.name: vlanReserved
column.remarks: Total maximum number of VLANs reserved by all enterprises. (enterprise.vlanHard)

column.name: vlanUsed
column.remarks: Total number of VLANs in use by any datacenter managed.

column.name: vMachinesTotal
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual Machines managed by Abiquo.

column.name: vMachinesRunning
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual Machines currently in a running state.

column.name: vCpuTotal
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual CPUs in Virtual Machines managed (can be used for VMs).

column.name: vCpuReserved
column.remarks: Maximum number of Virtual CPUs reserved by all enterprises.

column.name: vCpuUsed
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual CPUs in Virtual Machines currently in a running state.

column.name: vMemoryTotal
column.remarks: Total amount of RAM managed (can be used for VMs) in Megabytes.

column.name: vMemoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum amount of RAM reserved by all enterprises in Megabytes.

column.name: vMemoryUsed
column.remarks: Total amount of RAM used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: vStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum storage size reserved by all enterprises for Virtual Machines in Megabytes.

column.name: vStorageUsed
column.remarks: Total storage size used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: vStorageTotal
column.remarks: Total storage size managed to be used by Virtual Machines in Megabytes.

column.name: numUsersCreated
column.remarks: Total number of users in system.

column.name: numVDCCreated
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual Data Centers in system.

column.name: numEnterprisesCreated
column.remarks: Total number of enterprises in system.

column.name: datastoreUuid
column.remarks: Datastore UUID set by Abiquo to identify shared datastores.

column.name: vCpuReserved
column.remarks: Maximum number of Virtual CPUs reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter.

column.name: vCpuUsed
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual CPUs in Virtual Machines currently in a running state.

column.name: memoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum amount of RAM reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: memoryUsed
column.remarks: Total amount of RAM used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: localStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum storage size reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter for Virtual Machines in Megabytes.

column.name: localStorageUsed
column.remarks: Total storage size used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: extStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum external storage size reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: extStorageUsed
column.remarks: External storage used (attached or mounted) by any virtual machines (in Megabytes).

column.name: repositoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum repository size reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: repositoryUsed
column.remarks: Total repository size currently used for this enterprise in this datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: publicIPsReserved
column.remarks: Total number of IPs assigned to a VirtualDatacenter (Reserved).

column.name: publicIPsUsed
column.remarks: Total number of IPs used by virtual machines.

column.name: vlanReserved
column.remarks: Total maximum number of VLANs reserved for this enterprise in this datacenter. (enterprise.vlanHard)

column.name: vlanUsed
column.remarks: Total number of VLANs in use by this datacenter.

column.name: vCpuReserved
column.remarks: Maximum number of Virtual CPUs reserved by all enterprises.

column.name: vCpuUsed
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual CPUs in Virtual Machines currently in a running state.

column.name: memoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum amount of RAM reserved by all enterprises in Megabytes.

column.name: memoryUsed
column.remarks: Total amount of RAM used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: localStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum storage size reserved by all enterprises for Virtual Machines in Megabytes.

column.name: localStorageUsed
column.remarks: Total storage size used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: extStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum external storage size reserved by all enterprises in Bytes.

column.name: extStorageUsed
column.remarks: External storage used (attached or mounted) by any virtual machines (in Megabytes)

column.name: repositoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum repository size reserved by all enterprises in Megabytes.

column.name: repositoryUsed
column.remarks: Total repository size currently used by all enterprises in Megabytes.

column.name: publicIPsReserved
column.remarks: Total number of IPs assigned to a VirtualDatacenter (Reserved)

column.name: publicIPsUsed
column.remarks: Total number of IPs used by virtual machines

column.name: vlanReserved
column.remarks: Total maximum number of VLANs reserved by all enterprises. (enterprise.vlanHard)

column.name: vlanUsed
column.remarks: Total number of VLANs in use by any datacenter managed.

column.name: idState
column.remarks: 0 - STOPPED 1 - NOT PROVISIONED 2 - NOT MANAGED 3 - MANAGED 4 - HALTED 5 - UNLICENSED 6 - HA_IN_PROGRESS 7 - DISABLED_FOR_HA

column.name: haEnabled
column.remarks: TRUE - This rack is enabled for the HA functionality

column.name: resourceSubType
column.remarks: For IPs: 0 = private, 1 = public, 2 = external

column.name: vappName
column.remarks: Name for this virtual appliance

column.name: vdcName
column.remarks: Name for the virtualdatacenter

column.name: vmCreated
column.remarks: Number of virtual machines created in this virtual appliance

column.name: vmActive
column.remarks: Number of virtual machines currently running in this virtual appliance

column.name: volAssociated
column.remarks: Number of volumes associated to this virtual appliance

column.name: volAttached
column.remarks: Number of volumes currently attached to a virtual machine in this virtual appliance

column.name: vdcName
column.remarks: Name for the virtualdatacenter

column.name: vmCreated
column.remarks: Number of virtual machines created in this virtual datacenter

column.name: vmActive
column.remarks: Number of virtual machines currently running in this virtual datacenter

column.name: volCreated
column.remarks: Number of volumes created in this virtual datacenter

column.name: volAssociated
column.remarks: Number of volumes associated to a virtual machine in this virtual datacenter

column.name: volAttached
column.remarks: Number of volumes currently attached to a virtual machine in this virtual datacenter

column.name: vCpuReserved
column.remarks: Maximum number of Virtual CPUs reserved for this enterprise in this virtual datacenter.

column.name: vCpuUsed
column.remarks: Total number of Virtual CPUs in Virtual Machines currently in a running state.

column.name: memoryReserved
column.remarks: Maximum amount of RAM reserved for this enterprise in this virtual datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: memoryUsed
column.remarks: Total amount of RAM used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: localStorageUsed
column.remarks: Total storage size used by Virtual Machines currently in a running state in Megabytes.

column.name: extStorageReserved
column.remarks: Maximum external storage size reserved for this enterprise in this virtual datacenter in Megabytes.

column.name: extStorageUsed
column.remarks: External storage used (attached or mounted) by any virtual machines (in Megabytes).

column.name: publicIPsReserved
column.remarks: Total number of IPs assigned to this virtualDatacenter (Reserved).

column.name: publicIPsUsed
column.remarks: Total number of IPs used by virtual machines.

column.name: vlanReserved
column.remarks: Total maximum number of VLANs reserved for this enterprise in this virtual datacenter. (enterprise.vlanHard)

column.name: vlanUsed
column.remarks: Total number of VLANs in use by this virtual datacenter.

column.name: public
column.remarks: 0-No 1-Yes

column.name: high_disponibility
column.remarks: 0-No 1-Yes

column.name: shared
column.remarks: 0-No 1-Yes

column.name: idType
column.remarks: 0 - NOT MANAGED BY ABICLOUD 1 - MANAGED BY ABICLOUD

column.name: idUser
column.remarks: User who creates the VM

column.name: idEnterprise
column.remarks: Enterprise of the user
